Detailed Description

Define MGImage Class.

MGImage defines the attributes of Image.

Member Function Documentation

void MGImage::resize ( int  width,
int  height 
)

resize the image size to (width,height).

Scaling the whole image to the size (width, height).

void MGImage::resize_with_fill_color ( int  width,
int  height,
const pixel &  pdata 
)

resize the image size to (width,height) filling the color to the extra part for the size(width,height).

resize_with_fill_color() does not perform scaling to the image. width and height can be less than the original length. In this case, image trimming will be done.
